intro.description: This Cheat Sheet brings an example of use of the DICE Monitoring Tool. This tool is currently externally integrated, so the main functionality remains in an external website or server

item.title: Configure the tool
item.description: Before launching the tool, you need to check the connection properties to the external website

subitem.label: Open the preferences page of the Monitoring Tool (Window -> Preferences -> DICE -> Monitoring Tool)
Check the attributes of the preferences page and modify the values properly. This values are used when launching the tool

item.title: Connect to the Monitoring Service Admin UI
item.description: The Admin interface of Monitoring Service gives access to operations that manage the monitoring platform and the monitored nodes. Simply click on the menu "DICE Tools -> DICE Monitoring Service", and the website will be opened

item.title: Launch the Monitoring Service Visualization UI
item.description: The Visualization interface of Monitoring Service enables end-users to create graphs out of collected monitored data. This interface is available on the menu "DICE Tools -> DICE Monitoring Service Visualization UI"
